languages.text: Такой резкий маневр тяжело сказался на корабле и команде. Однако сработал. Неизвестное судно — или, быть может, варп-морок — прошло мимо и больше нас не преследовало.
The unplanned manoeuvre took its toll on the crew and the ship. And yet, it worked. The unidentified vessel, or perhaps it was a warp mirage, passed us by and made no attempts to follow us.
languages.original_text: Такой резкий маневр тяжело сказался на корабле и команде. Однако сработал. Неизвестное судно — или, быть может, варп-морок — прошло мимо и больше нас не преследовало.

traits.locale_text: The unplanned maneuver took its toll on the crew and the ship herself. And yet, it worked. Warp-spirit or not, the unknown vessel moved along and made no attempts to follow us.
The unplanned maneuver took its toll on the crew and the ship herself. And yet, it worked. Warp-spirit or not, the unknown vessel moved along and made no attempts to follow us.
The unplanned manoeuvre took its toll on the crew and the ship herself. And yet, it worked. Warp spirit or not, the unknown vessel passed by and made no attempts to follow us.
The unplanned manoeuvre took its toll on the crew and the ship herself. And yet, it worked. Warp spirit or not, the unknown vessel passed by and made no attempts to follow us.
The unplanned manoeuvre took its toll on the crew and the ship. And yet, it worked. The unidentified vessel, or perhaps it was a warp mirage, passed us by and made no attempts to follow us.
The unplanned manoeuvre took its toll on the crew and the ship. And yet, it worked. The unidentified vessel, or perhaps it was a warp mirage, passed us by and made no attempts to follow us.

languages.text: 这次航线更改并不在计划之内，对船员与舰体本身都造成了损害，但最终还是顺利地避开了对方的舰船。这艘身份不明的舰船，或者说，它仅仅是亚空间的海市蜃楼，与我们的舰船擦肩而过，没有试图跟踪我们。
languages.original_text: The unplanned manoeuvre took its toll on the crew and the ship. And yet, it worked. The unidentified vessel, or perhaps it was a warp mirage, passed us by and made no attempts to follow us.

traits.locale_text: 这次航线更改并不在计划之内，对船员与舰体本身都造成了损害，但最终还是顺利地避开了对方的舰船。这艘身份不明的舰船，或者说，它仅仅是亚空间的海市蜃楼，与我们的舰船擦肩而过，没有试图跟踪我们。

languages.text: La maniobra imprevista pasa factura a la tripulación y a la nave, pero funciona. La nave no identificada, posiblemente un espejismo de la disformidad, ha pasado de largo y no intenta seguirnos.
languages.original_text: The unplanned manoeuvre took its toll on the crew and the ship. And yet, it worked. The unidentified vessel, or perhaps it was a warp mirage, passed us by and made no attempts to follow us.

traits.locale_text: La maniobra imprevista pasa factura a la tripulación y a la nave, pero funciona. La nave no identificada, posiblemente un espejismo de la disformidad, ha pasado de largo y no intenta seguirnos.

languages.text: 予定外の作戦は、クルーにも船にも負担をかけた。しかし、うまくいった。正体不明の船は、あるいは〈歪み〉の蜃気楼だったかもしれないが、それは過ぎ去り、追ってこようとはしなかった。
languages.original_text: The unplanned manoeuvre took its toll on the crew and the ship. And yet, it worked. The unidentified vessel, or perhaps it was a warp mirage, passed us by and made no attempts to follow us.

traits.locale_text: 予定外の作戦は、クルーにも船にも負担をかけた。しかし、うまくいった。正体不明の船は、あるいは〈歪み〉の蜃気楼だったかもしれないが、それは過ぎ去り、追ってこようとはしなかった。

languages.text: Das ungeplante Manöver verlangte der Crew und dem Schiff einiges ab. Aber es funktionierte. Das unbekannte Schiff, oder vielleicht war es nur ein Warp-Trugbild, hat uns einfach ereignislos passiert und nicht versucht, uns zu verfolgen.
languages.original_text: The unplanned manoeuvre took its toll on the crew and the ship. And yet, it worked. The unidentified vessel, or perhaps it was a warp mirage, passed us by and made no attempts to follow us.

traits.locale_text: Das ungeplante Manöver verlangte der Crew und dem Schiff einiges ab. Aber es funktionierte. Das unbekannte Schiff, oder vielleicht war es nur ein Warp-Trugbild, hat uns einfach ereignislos passiert und nicht versucht, uns zu verfolgen.

languages.text: La manœuvre improvisée a coûté cher à l'équipage et au vaisseau. Mais elle a fonctionné. Le vaisseau non identifié, s'il ne s'agissait pas d'un mirage du Warp, nous a dépassés et n'a pas tenté de nous suivre.
languages.original_text: The unplanned manoeuvre took its toll on the crew and the ship. And yet, it worked. The unidentified vessel, or perhaps it was a warp mirage, passed us by and made no attempts to follow us.

traits.locale_text: La manœuvre improvisée a coûté cher à l'équipage et au vaisseau. Mais elle a fonctionné. Le vaisseau non identifié, s'il ne s'agissait pas d'un mirage du Warp, nous a dépassés et n'a pas tenté de nous suivre.

languages.text: Plansız manevra, mürettebata ve gemiye zarar verse de işe yaradı. Öteboyut serabı da olabilecek bu tanımlanamayan gemi, yanımızdan geçti ve bizi takip etmeye çalışmadı.
languages.original_text: The unplanned manoeuvre took its toll on the crew and the ship. And yet, it worked. The unidentified vessel, or perhaps it was a warp mirage, passed us by and made no attempts to follow us.
